ausuka.ai.timeout: [Ausuka.ai] Response timed out or failed. Please try again later.
ausuka.ai.no_response: Timeout. I could not generate a reply. Please try a different phrasing.
aim.not_ready: §e[Ausuka.ai] AI not configured or unavailable. Configure API key first.
aim.name.forbidden: §c[System] Detected assistant identity; AI chat mode is disabled.
aim.already_in_chat: §c[Ausuka.ai] You are already in AI chat mode! Use /ai exit to leave.
aim.say.no_response: I could not generate a reply. Please try again.
aim.not_in_chat: §e[Ausuka.ai] You are not in AI chat mode.
aim.say.error: §c[Ausuka.ai] Failed to process your request. Please try again.
aim.help.admin.auto.toggle: §c/ai admin auto-msg toggle§r - Toggle auto messages
aim.help.admin.auto.status: §c/ai admin auto-msg status§r - Show auto message status
aim.help.admin.auto.personal: §c/ai admin auto-msg personal <player> <on|off>§r - Per-player auto messages
aim.help.tips.line1: §e💡 Tip: In AI chat, just say what you need!
aim.help.tips.line2: §e🔄 Use /ai new to start a fresh conversation.
aim.admin.title: §c[Admin] Ausuka.ai Admin Menu
aim.admin.auto.title: §c[Admin] Auto Message Controls
aim.chat.welcome.fallback: §b[Ausuka.ai] §fHello %s! I'm Ausuka.ai — ask me for items, smart teleport, memory, and building tips. Tell me what you need! ✨
tool.weather.changed.clear: §b[Ausuka.ai] §f☀️ Weather set to clear for %s seconds (world: %s)
tool.weather.changed.rain: §b[Ausuka.ai] §f🌧️ Weather set to rain for %s seconds (world: %s)
tool.weather.changed.thunder: §b[Ausuka.ai] §f⛈️ Weather set to thunder for %s seconds (world: %s)
